markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Evanescent Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=2632) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sprite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=238" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 130 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per round

</column>

---

You've manifested wings that can flutter for brief spurts. You [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=2312). If you don't normally have a fly Speed, you gain a fly Speed of 15 feet for this movement. If you aren't on solid ground at the end of this movement, you fall.

<title level="2">Evanescent Wings leads to...</title>
[Energize Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=2639)
name: Evanescent Wings
